name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
schedule:
• Overview 
• Perfect gas equation 
• Real gases 
• The kinetic theory of gases
• Gas adsorption and desorption
• The First Law
• Enthalpy
• Thermochemistry
• Internal energy
• The Second Law
• The Statistical entropy
• The thermodynamic entropy
• Entropy changes for specific processes
• The Third Law
• Spontaneous processes
• Standard Gibbs energies
• Combining the First and Second Laws
• Reaction rates
• Integrated rate laws
•Reactions approaching equilibrium
• The Arrhenius equation
• Reaction mechanisms
• Overview of reaction dynamics
scorePolicy:
・四次考試 各佔 25%        
・點名不到一次扣學期總分 1 分
materials: Physical Chemistry-Quanta, Matter, and Change, Atkins’, Oxford University Press  (滄海)
